com.bham.bd.view.model

Class CustomStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • com.bham.bd.view.model.CustomStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventTarget

    public class CustomStage
extends Stage

    Sub-menu

    Custom stage for every window.

    it only has for elements, e.g game title, skin color, Min button and Close button.
